thread.title: Apple investigating teen s claims iPhone 7 Plus blew up while charging - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Apple investigating teen s claims iPhone 7 Plus blew up while charging - Yahoo7

author: Aap On February
title: Apple investigating teen s claims iPhone 7 Plus blew up while charging - Yahoo7
text:
Share Apple investigating teen s claims iPhone 7 Plus blew up while charging - Yahoo7 Apple is investigating a report by an Arizona teen that her iPhone 7 Plus "blew up" as it was charging and began spewing smoke. Close Apple investigating teen's claims iPhone 7 Plus 'blew up' UP NEXT VIDEO Apple is investigating a report by an Arizona teen that her iPhone 7 Plus "blew up" as it was charging and began spewing smoke. Source: Twitter Apple investigating teen's claims iPhone 7 Plus 'blew up' 
"We are in touch with the customer and looking into it," an Apple representative told Mashable, which first reported the news. 
The customer, Brianna Olivas, posted a video on Twitter on Wednesday showing her rose-gold iPhone 7 Plus with a melted case smouldering on a bathroom counter. Photo: Twitter BriannaOlivas_ 
"So my IPhone 7 plus blew up this morning... was not even using it, literally no explanation for this," she wrote. 
For now, there's no evidence that the charred remains of this particular iPhone 7 are anything but an isolated incident, although in spring an Australian man reported a similar incident with the smartphone. Apple did not respond to a request for further information on Friday. 
Last year, Samsung took a major financial hit after its high-end Galaxy Note 7 smartphone turned out to be at risk for catching fire or even exploding because of a battery design flaw. 
The company issued a recall but its replacement units had the same issue. Samsung was forced to kill off the device, which the company said would result in losses of more than $5 billion. Close Samsung Reveals Cause of Exploding Galaxy Note7 Smartphones UP NEXT
